item.title: BUTLER NATIONAL CORP 10-K
item.description: BUTLER NATIONAL CORP, which is in the Services-Miscellaneous Amusement & Recreation [7990] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 15, 2022 had 16883 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 195 instances company - 142 instances financial - 138 instances 30 - 137 instances 2021 - 134 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
